text: Hianagi Ra Anumzamo'a Jerusalemi kumakura amanage hie, Ha' vahekamo'zama hankavenentake sondia vahekama nezmavre'za feno zantaminema rohu'ma re'za eri'za vu'naza zantamina ete erigahue. Ana nehu'na tamagri'ma ha'ma eme huramantesia vahera hahunezmante'na, mofavre nagaka'a zamagu'vazi'na ete zamavaregahue.
